privates.name: Woosong Railway
privates.description: One-off payment of either ¥40 when the last 2+2 train is bought, or ¥70 when the last 3 train is bought, or ¥100 when the last 3+3 train is bought.

privates.name: Yanda Ferry Company
privates.description: Owner may use all ferries for free with all of their companies.

privates.name: Taiwan Western Line
privates.description: Owner receives +20 to Taiwan with all of their companies.

privates.name: River Ferry
privates.description: Minus ¥20 for river hexes for all of their companies.

privates.name: Jeme Tien Yow Engineer Office
privates.description: Building permit for Phase D for one of their companies.

privates.name: Imperial Qing Government
privates.description: +20% Director of BCR which starts at 100. BCR may always lay 2 yellow tiles.

privates.name: Rocket of China
privates.description: Exchangable for a 2-4 train, Forced exchange into second 4 train.

phases.name: A1
phases.notes: Companies float at 20%, 50% capitalisation, 5 shares available

phases.name: B1
phases.notes: Companies float at 30%, 10 shares available, Full capitalisation once 5 shares are in play

phases.name: A1
phases.notes: Companies float at 20%, 50% capitalisation, 5 shares available

phases.name: B1
phases.notes: Companies float at 30%, 10 shares available, Full capitalisation once 5 shares are in play

phases.name: B3
phases.notes: Companies float at 40%, Communist Takeover, Foreign Investors become inactive

phases.name: C2
phases.notes: Companies float at 60%, Shanghai Stock Exchange re-opens

notes.note: Shares in the market pay dividends to the corporation
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares cannot be sold during the first stock round
